data.comment: The match has started at Villa Park.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 3, Southampton drive forward but Che Adams is judged offside.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Southampton are pushing forward but Theo Walcott's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
Darren England signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Southampton's half.
Aston Villa's Jack Grealish is whistled for offside at Villa Park.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Aston Villa's Jack Grealish gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Southampton defender.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 12, James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ross Barkley (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Darren England signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Southampton's half.
Throw-in for Southampton at Villa Park.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Southampton close to the penalty box.
Can Southampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Aston Villa's half?
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 20, Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton just outside Aston Villa's area.
Jannik Vestergaard scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from James Ward-Prowse to set up the goal.
In the minute 21, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
Jan Bednarek is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Southampton.
Jan Bednarek for Southampton is back on the field again.
Darren England waits before resuming play because Bertrand Traore for Aston Villa is still down.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 29, Bertrand Traore (Aston Villa) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Trezeguet.
Darren England signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 31, Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Southampton!
Goal! Southampton extend their lead to 0-2 through James Ward-Prowse.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Southampton.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Darren England signals a throw-in for Aston Villa, close to Southampton's area.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Darren England blows against Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins for offside.
Goal kick for Southampton at Villa Park.
In the minute 40, Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 42, Southampton to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Darren England signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 43, Aston Villa's Matty Cash has been booked in Birmingham.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 45, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
The first half has been concluded at Villa Park.
Great finish from James Ward-Prowse to give Southampton a 0-3 lead.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Villa Park.
Ralph Hasenhuttl (Southampton) is making a first substitution, with Jack Stephens replacing Jan Bednarek.
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Aston Villa.
Darren England signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 51, Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Darren England signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In Birmingham Aston Villa drive forward through Jack Grealish. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 52, Aston Villa's Trezeguet is on target but unsuccessful.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Throw-in for Southampton at Villa Park.
In the minute 54, Free kick Southampton.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Darren England awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Southampton's Stuart Armstrong misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Darren England signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 58, Goal! Southampton extend their lead to 0-4 through Danny Ings.
That's a fine assist from Stuart Armstrong.
Southampton's James Ward-Prowse breaks free at Villa Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 59, Darren England awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Free kick Aston Villa.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
In the minute 62, Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 1-4. Tyrone Mings got above everyone else to nod it in.
Jack Grealish with an assist there.
Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 64, Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Aston Villa in Birmingham.
In the minute 66, Southampton needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
Southampton have a goal kick.
Ahmed Elmohamady is replacing Matty Cash for the home team.
In the minute 68, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Southampton at Villa Park.
In the minute 69, Aston Villa pushes forward through Ollie Watkins, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Matt Targett of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 73, Danny Ings for Southampton is whistled offside.
In Birmingham Aston Villa attack through Trezeguet. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Birmingham.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Aston Villa drives forward and Trezeguet gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 77, Southampton have a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Birmingham to check on Douglas Luiz, who is grimacing with pain.
Attention is being given to Southampton’s Che Adams and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 79, Ibrahima Diallo is on a sub for Ryan Bertrand for Southampton.
Aston Villa’s Douglas Luiz is on his feet again at Villa Park.
Darren England signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 80, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Darren England awards Southampton a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Southampton's Che Adams is back in action after a slight knock.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Danny Ings.
In the minute 85, It seems as if Danny Ings is unable to continue. Shane Long replaces him for the away team.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
Darren England signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Ahmed Elmohamady of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
At Villa Park the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Aston Villa have been awarded a penalty...
It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Southampton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Aston Villa.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
The match is over. Final score 3-4.
Ibrahima Diallo for Southampton has been booked by Darren England and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Ollie Watkins nets a penalty for Aston Villa. They now trail 2-4.
Jack Grealish instrumental with a fine assist.
Jack Grealish strikes to reduce the deficit to 3-4 at Villa Park.
